name: Nacht Der Untoten Multiplayer
description:
This is a Halloween special that is a remake of the Nazi Zombies from BO1/WAW.

Please consider donating even though this is a small game i still put a lot of effort i work day to night on these games including this one.

There won't be many updates for this game other than the zones update which will add barrier doors and unlockable parts of the level, it may not come out as i want to work on another project which is a similar sort of zombie game except it's better in terms of animation but simplified more as it's not multiplayer so stay tuned for that :)

To play this game with people online you must either port forward or use some third party virtual lan program which will let other people join your virtually created LAN. One of my favorites and the one i suggest using is hamachi: https://www.vpn.net/

To actually play with hamachi you must type this command by hitting ~ on your keyboard and typing "open map_Nacht_der_Untoten?listen"

then your friend has to type "open (hamachi ip)" and you will be able to play together :).

Credits:
Map - Sneaky Kitty Game Dev

Assets - Quixel
